BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH1_DTL (STR_REQ_APP_NO,DT_REQ_APP_DATE,STR_EMP_NO, DT_PUBLISH_DATE, STR_DESC_OF_PAPER, STR_JOURNAL_NAME, STR_TYPE, STR_OTH_DETAILS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH2_DTL (STR_REQ_APP_NO,STR_MEM_TYPE,STR_MEM_EMP_CODE,STR_EXT_MEM_NAME,STR_EXT_MEM_DESIG,STR_EXT_MEM_DEPT,STR_EXT_MEM_ADD,STR_EXT_MEM_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH1_DTL A SET A.STR_REQ_APP_NO=?,A.DT_REQ_APP_DATE=?,A.STR_EMP_NO=?,A.DT_PUBLISH_DATE=?,A.STR_DESC_OF_PAPER=?,A.STR_JOURNAL_NAME=?,A.STR_TYPE=?,A.STR_OTH_DETAILS=?,A.STR_VALID_STATUS=?,A.DT_VALID_DATE=?,A.STR_VALID_BY=?,A.STR_REMARKS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH2_DTL A WHERE A.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH2_DTL (STR_REQ_APP_NO,STR_MEM_TYPE,STR_MEM_EMP_CODE,STR_EXT_MEM_NAME,STR_EXT_MEM_DESIG,STR_EXT_MEM_DEPT,STR_EXT_MEM_ADD,STR_EXT_MEM_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH1_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_PAPER_PUBLISH2_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
